Subject: Upgrade software & Audit requirements
Description:
Kindly provide us with the latest upgrade patch for our EPP server. We are currently running 5.9.1.0. 
Also we would like to acquire some offline documentations for EPP, as well as the SLA details for our account; These are required by our internal audit team.
What_We_Know__c: The customer needed guidance on how to perform server upgrade
Solution_Comment__c: The customer needed guidance on how to perform server upgrade, and I delivered this informations to him.
Account_Name__c: The Emirates Centre for Strategic Studies & Research
